title: $:/litClock/times/-07:30-William Trevor
quote_last: the next morning he rang the bell of 21 Blenheim Avenue.

title: $:/litClock/times/-07:30-Bohumil Hrabal
quote_last: the station-master came into the traffic office. He weighed almost sixteen stone, but women always said that he was incredibly light on his feet when he danced.
